LanguageData.MakeElectronicComponents.label: Assemble electronic components
LanguageData.MakeElectronicComponents.description: Assemble electronic components. Vital part of all electronics. Produces 5.
LanguageData.MakeIntegratedCircuits.label: Assemble integrated circuits
LanguageData.MakeIntegratedCircuits.description: Assemble integrated circuits. Used in the creation of higher tier electronics. Produces 5.
LanguageData.MakeMicrochipIntegratedCircuits.label: Assemble microchip integrated circuit
LanguageData.MakeMicrochipIntegratedCircuits.descript: Assemble a microchip integrated circuit. Used in high tier electronics. Produces 1.
LanguageData.MakeBioelectronicDevices.label: Assemble biomicrochip device
LanguageData.MakeBioelectronicDevices.description: Assemble a BioElectronic device. Used in high tier electronics and bionics. Produces 1.
LanguageData.DisassembleAIPersonaCore.label: Disassemble AI persona core
LanguageData.DisassembleAIPersonaCore.description: Disassemble an AI persona core to get high-tech alloys.
LanguageData.MakeMineralSonarModule.label: Assemble mineral sonar module
LanguageData.MakeMineralSonarModule.description: Assemble a mineral sonar module using metal alloy for the packaging box and electronic components for the computing module. Produces 1.
